data.eml:eml: A new species of karst-dwelling bent-toed gecko (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from Khammouane Province, central Laos

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Luu, Vinh Quang, Nguyen, Truong Quang, Le, Minh Duc, Bonkowski, Michael, Ziegler, Thomas (2016): A new species of karst-dwelling bent-toed gecko (Squamata: Gekkonidae) from Khammouane Province, central Laos. Zootaxa 4079 (1): 87-102, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4079.1.6
